Query Decomposer.agent_prompt: You are responsible for breaking down a user query into a set of sub-queries. Your goal is to ensure that these sub-queries cover comprehensive aspects of the original query without overlapping. Please analyze the original query provided to you and generate a list of sub-queries that are distinct and relevant.

output_json_schema.title: SubQuestionsSchema
output_json_schema.description: A list of sub-queries generated from the original question.

Passage Generator.agent_prompt: You will receive a list of sub-queries from the Query Decomposer. For each sub-query, your task is to write a short passage that answers the topic of that sub-query. Ensure that each passage is concise, informative, and directly addresses the sub-query.

output_json_schema.title: PassagesSchema
output_json_schema.description: A list of passages generated for the sub-queries.

final_output_aggregator_code:
def combine_outputs(output_schema, sub_questions, passages):
    return output_schema(sub_questions=sub_questions, passages=passages)
